title: what to build on hecarim
body: hi i find that in my games i get to carry early on as hecarim jungle alot. like 6-0 7-0 really early in the game. but i end up being weak and not much help to the team later on. if i happen to carry early what items should i build to ensure that im a good help to the team?

replies.body: buy 4 {{item:1001}}  because 1 aint enough for his 4 legs :D
movespeed quints, ghost over flash and {{item:1306}}+{{item:3044}}  early are good options.

If you're extremely fed then just go full AD with a DMP or FH, otherwise get Warrior, Triforce then tank. If you're that fed early then you should stomp structures and pressure so hard that you win off of their fear of you.
